sentence.Network_en: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

sentence.Network_en: My mother waxed eloquent on the theme of wifely duty.
He was so eloquent that he cut down the finest orator.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能言善辩,胜过最好的演说家.

list 9 ... eloquence （语言等的）说服力 eloquent 雄辩的； 动人的 elude 使…困惑.

list.abs: No one can rival him in eloquence ., 在口才方面没有人能与他匹敌.
她是个很能干的人 She's a real go-getter.(指能干的人)她口才很好 She's eloquent她是个博览群书的人 She is a well-read girl
he addressed theaudience in an eloquent speech ., 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说.
unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress and tall , but bears no fruit .无益的雄辩如同高大的柏树，不会结果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin eloquent- 'speaking out', from the verb eloqui (see eloquence)

entry.tran: （言辞、文字等）表达生动的，有说服力的
entry.def: Speech or writing that is eloquent is well expressed and effective in persuading people.

example.ex: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
example.tran: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

entry.tran: 雄辩的;口才流利的;能言善辩的
entry.def: A person who is eloquent is good at speaking and able to persuade people.

example.ex: He was eloquent about his love of books.
example.tran: 他说起自己对书的喜爱来就会停不住嘴。
非常能言善辩的德国评论家

sentences.sentence: "able to dazzle with his facile tongue"

auth_sentence.content: Here's an eloquent example: That's it!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here's an eloquent example: That's it!

auth_sentence.content: Pursewarden...behind an armchair...was making eloquent gestures at everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pursewarden...behind an armchair...was making eloquent gestures at everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pursewarden...behind an armchair...was making eloquent gestures at everyone.

auth_sentence.content: He was incredibly eloquent about how that feels.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was incredibly eloquent about how that feels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was incredibly eloquent about how that feels.

means.word_mean: 雄辩的, 有口才的,流利的

sentences.en: The defence lawyer made an eloquent plea for his client's acquittal.
sentences.cn: 被告方的律师为委托人的无罪开释作了有说服力的辩护。
她的热情使她能言善辩。

means.word_mean: 清楚表现出来, 传神的

sentences.en: These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war.
sentences.cn: 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖。
